channel.title: Logic
channel.description: Elias Judin's academic website and mathematics research blog on category theory, universal algebra, topology, and sheaf theory.

item.title: Tarski's automorphisms
item.description: Notes on Alfred Tarski’s 1966 lecture “What are logical notions?” and his proposal that logical notions are precisely those invariant under all automorphisms of the universe of discourse, with references for further reading.
